text: George Girton: "OMG thank you for posting such a funny article about Powder Mountain, formerly a ski resort in a relatively flat area of the Wasatch Mountains in Utah. I skied there about 30 years ago with my young daughter. We had a great time. In a good year, they still get enough snow that you can ski there. I think the only ski areas for sale these days are the ones that arenâ€™t really worth anything anymore.(At least as ski areas). Anyway, thanks for that Guardian article, what a send up. That was great!"
